item.itunes:author: Lance Zeeman | Solid Gold Podcast Studios
item.title: Duke's Famous Hot Wings
item.itunes:title: Duke's Famous Hot Wings
item.itunes:subtitle: Sonics Boneles Escape with 2Pac
item.description:
A SEGA classic video game adaptation is at the movies this week and it is GOOD. The day the music died might just be somewhere in February 2020.The Work in Progress 2PAC: THE GREAT ESCAPE claims that the late rapper is alive and well in New Mexico.HAND SANITIZERS and FACE MASKS hit LONDON FASHION WEEK thanks to COVID-19. THE BRACELET OF SILENCE is the must have accessory to prevent eavesdropping in the digital age and hip hop outfit BONE THUGS-N-HARMONY loose the bones.


Vinyl Recordings under threat after fire. https://www.rollingstone.com/music/music-news/vinyl-industry-apollo-masters-fire-951903/

2Pac is alive,well and hiding out in New Mexico. https://movieweb.com/tupac-alive-movie-2pac-great-escape-from-umc/

Hip Hop legends change name to promote Chicken Wings. https://ew.com/music/2020/02/19/bone-thugs-n-harmony-change-name-boneless-thugs/

item.title: The Man with the Hat Preys on Wandavision
item.itunes:title: The Man with the Hat Preys on Wandavision
item.itunes:subtitle: Dana Sundances with Tinder
item.description:
MARGOT ROBBIE gets emancipated at the movies this week, SIMPHIWE DANA finally drops some new music while HARRISON FORD puts on his HAT with a WHIP in his hand. A local film gets noticed at THE SUNDANCE FILM FESTIVAL and MARVEL are going all suburbia on us as WANDAVISION gets ready to stream later in the year. TINDER's latest update has your safety in mind. Tune into the WEEKEND PARTY every Friday night at 8pm on HOT 91.9FM Podcast available courtesy of SOLID GOLD STUDIOS


https://www.sowetanlive.co.za/entertainment/2020-02-05-songstress-simphiwe-dana-back-with-new-music/ 3

https://variety.com/2020/film/reviews/this-is-not-a-burial-its-a-resurrection-film-review-1203495199/ Simphiwe Dana releases some new music.

https://screenrant.com/wandavision-marvel-disney-plus-show-title-meaning-scarlet-witch/ Local film gets noticed at Sundance.

item.title: All Hail Billie Bryant's Atari
item.itunes:title: All Hail Billie Bryant's Atari
item.itunes:subtitle: Queen Equalizes Feder's Reality
item.description:
TIFFANY HADDISH tries to replicate her 2017 success at the movies this week, the music performer for RODGER FEDER'S MATCH IN AFRICA is announced,QUEEN LATIFAH looks set to take over a character previously played by DENZEL WASHINGTON,are we getting too old for this shit? LETHAL WEAPON 5 is on the way...BILLIE EILISH confirmed for the OSCARS, pioneering gaming giant ATARI to enter the hospitality industry and OSCAR winner KOBE BEAN BRYANT'S film is available for free on the Internet.


RIP Kobe Bean Bryant https://dearbasketball.com/

Queen Latifah takes on The Equalizer https://variety.com/2020/tv/news/equalizer-queen-latifah-reboot-cbs-pilot-1203483108/

Atari to enter the hospitality Industry. https://atarihotels.com/

item.title: Bad Boys Jason Zeeman and some Queens
item.itunes:title: Bad Boys Jason Zeeman and some Queens
item.itunes:subtitle: Coins cryptocurrency and pets playlists are coming our way
item.description:
WILL SMITH and MARTIN LAWRENCE are back on the BIG SCREEN, JASON ZEEMAN releases an EP,a streaming service taps into the lucrative pet market by offering a playlist for your friend, QUEEN will join The Queen on your pocket change and recording artist AKON looks to the future.

item.title: The Force is with Mr Anderson he is The One
item.itunes:title: The Force is with Mr Anderson he is The One
item.itunes:subtitle: 1917 streams 007
item.description:
A movie about WWI is a game changer for war movies. COLIN ANDERSON flies the SA flag with CHARLIZE THERON and TREVOR NOAH at this years HOLLYWOOD AWARD season. The performer for the theme song for the new BOND film NO TIME TO DIE has been announced and a lot of your favorites are getting re imagined and are coming to a streaming platform near you such as LORD OF THE RINGS,SILENCE OF THE LAMBS and SUPERMAN and LOIS while a British News Reporter gets duped by an Australian TV Producer.


Colin Anderson Interview with Derek Stettler https://www.provideocoalition.com/art-of-the-shot-colin-anderson-soc-on-his-career-and-shooting-star-wars/

Billie Eilish tune set for James Bond theme song https://variety.com/2020/music/news/billie-eilish-james-bond-hans-zimmer-no-time-to-die-1203466322/

item.title: Ford vs Ferrari vs Bullet vs Coldplay
item.itunes:title: Ford vs Ferrari vs Bullet vs Coldplay
item.itunes:subtitle: Carbon Neutral Obama Casters Cage
item.description:
2019's great team ups for adults at the movies continues with BALE vs DAMON in FORD vs FERRARI. CASTER SEMENYA stars in a short film, former SPRINGBOK hooker JAMES DALTON releases an autobiography. NICOLAS CAGE set to play himself in a movie, MICHELLE OBAMA is up against THE BEASTIE BOYS at next years GRAMMY'S while THE SON OF PATRICIA takes on ELLEN and DAVID CHAPPELLE. COLDPLAY release a new album, but put touring on HOLD while they try to figure out how to be CARBON NEUTRAL on the road.


Birthplace of Dreams: A Caster Semenya short film. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qXYBcigxjpQ

Coldplay are planning a Carbon Neutral tour. https://www.independent.co.uk/arts-entertainment/music/news/coldplay-new-album-chris-martin-environment-everyday-life-world-tour-tickets-show-a9211731.html

Springbok legend James Dalton releases an autobiography. https://www.sport24.co.za/Rugby/RugbyWorldCup2019/james-dalton-im-proud-to-be-a-springbok-again-20191121

item.description:

KEANU REEVES is in the next SPONGEBOB movie, NETFLIX are going to make the next BEVERLY HILLS COP with EDDIE MURPHY, film composer DANNY ELFMAN launches an online course to teach music. ALICIA KEYS to host next years GRAMMY'S and ROD STEWART teams up with the ROYAL PHILHARMONIC ORCHESTRA for a new album and wants to do a country record.
